attributes.action: change parliament sittings so that the house is 'open' 9.00am until 5.00pm like most businesses.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Much has been said about MP expenses, second homes etc, by changing the house 'sitting' times to normal business hours would minimise second homes etc AND ensure MP's are fresh to work for the country rather than being potentially half asleep due to excessive overall workload.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament: http://www.parliament.uk/
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
